title: A battle royale style for an RGM mode
body:
DISCLAIMER: IM NOT A FORTNITE FAN NOR PLAYER! NEITHER A PUBG FAN I JUST GOT THE IDEA WHILE LIVING MY WORTHLESS LIFE

It's like you choose where to spawn like casual battle royale games, you walk around and you find chests/crates that contain items or just items thrown around that you can pick up. items that you buy normally from the shop would be just thrown around the game. the champion pool would be reduced so that the item's pool can also be reduced to fit the champs involved and be able to spread items around in a nice rate.

really this idea is just a random idea I got out of nowhere it isn't that serious and I'm not begging for it to be in the game or anything I just think it's nice.

please tell me what you think politely it is just an idea here.

thanks for reading ^^

replies.body: Riot already answered: it just wont work without putting way too much effort into it, the engine is not ready.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E88rPX6V,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-24T19:39:14.506+0000)
>
> Riot already answered: it just wont work without putting way too much effort into it, the engine is not ready.

I think what they are saying is the game would lag out when more that 10 players ar on the map
Also Riot wants to focus on the 'team' aspect of the game

But I do like the OP idea.  I wish Riot would make it happen as a RGM

Not lag so much as i highly doubt the engine is even capable of putting over 10 champions on in one session without some serious modifications. They more or less confirmed that.

The network lag impact would actually be pretty minimal.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=E88rPX6V,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-07-31T19:51:56.611+0000)
>
> Not lag so much as i highly doubt the engine is even capable of putting over 10 champions on in one session without some serious modifications. They more or less confirmed that.
> 
> The network lag impact would actually be pretty minimal.

I remember they had a RGM with Twisted Tree Line and it was 6v6 and that seemed like the limit, it seemed like disconnects were frequent.  

Although there is no reason why it could not be a 10 player battle royal where you can only get to the store after a death.   Maybe as a timed 15 min game, most kills win or as 5 deaths and you are out (then you become a spectator) 

Maybe use the Ascension map and mode for this?  some objectives to get points so people dont hide in corners or sit in spawn area.  Could still use the 2 spawns and not allow attacking while in that area.
